Text:
thank you, you're a real Elvis fan. What is your favorite Elvis period?
 Witch country are you from?
1969-1972, and of course everything else...I'm from Croatia, where are you from ?

i'm from holland, my favorite period is the concert years and a lot of the movies i like also. it's the whole package. in holland they have a lot of concerts of the tcb band, it's great to listen to james etc. they still rock!

I must admit that I prefer early concert years, up to 1972., his voice was not exactly in his prime later.
But again, I love each and every Elvis performance...Would you know if there is "Always on my mind", concert version, and where ?
